channel.title: Ive worked so hard for this!
channel.description: ok well my source is "The New World V4.8" and i need to be owner now he said something about a commands ::giveadmin now how does this work?

int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
if ((newItemID <= 20000) && (newItemID >= 0)) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);

item.title: Ive worked so hard for this!
item.dc:creator: @Solid_snake1 Solid snake
item.description:
@Solid_snake1 wrote:

if(command.startsWith(“giveadmin”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Solid snake”)) {
String name = command.substring(10);
try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(solid snake);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 3;
c.playerIsMember = 4;
c.disconnected = true;
yell (name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(name+" either isn’t online or doesn’t exist");

This is it now and yet im still not admin =[

Read full topic
item.source: Ive worked so hard for this!

item.title: Ive worked so hard for this!
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

hehe is your ingame name kite? if not change it to your account name. you should also do the same to the givemod command also if you want i can give you my demod command. its just a noob altered givemod command.

ps: anywhere else where it says you need a certain name for a command like playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“kite”)) just go ahead and put your name in for kite. itll be better in the long run itll give you more abilitys.

pps: dang you kyle

Read full topic

try {
int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(solid snake);
client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p];
c.playerRights = 2;
c.playerIsMember = 4;
c.disconnected = true;
yell (name+" is now an Administrator");
} catch(Exception e) {

item.title: Ive worked so hard for this!
item.dc:creator: @Goddess Goddess
item.description:
@Goddess wrote:

look in your client.jav and in the commands area find the command “giveadmin” change the name beside it to yours or if its character rights and its 3 just leave it. Just during game type ::giveadmin name the name being the person you want to be an admin and boom there you go. they must be online for the command to work

Read full topic
